group_1.textLeft: Kanae!

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo...
Bring me with you... Show me the future.
I feel like...you can do it.

group_1.textLeft: I thought today was supposed to be lucky.@What kind of luck is this?

group_1.textRight: No, it is lucky... I...m-managed to save@you, Yachiyo-senpai...

group_1.narration: I saved...the leader I look up to so much...@I'm...really happy...I did...

group_1.textCenter: When I started to consider why I always@manage to survive.
You could interpret it all to mean this...

group_1.narration: I wished to [textRed:survive], so I could continue@being a leader...
So their lives were offered up in order for@me [textRed:to live].

group_1.textCenter: If that's the case, similar to how you@have healing powers...
And similar to Tsuruno's good luck, or@Mifuyu's ability to create illusions...

group_1.narration: "[textRed:The power to survive by sacrificing someone@else]."

group_1.textRight: No...

group_1.textLeft: You see?
If we stay together, my wish will eventually@kill you...
She really said that?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.narration: Yachiyo was invited by Touka, another@Magical Girl, to enter the Memory Museum.
As a result she got crushed by her@own resolve and the thoughts she'd@buried deep down inside her heart.
Along with her feelings@of guilt about our deaths...

group_1.textLeft: So...she's really going to break up the@team because of this?

group_1.textRight: I think so...
I should've just waited outside with you.
Being stuck watching like this@is...unbearable.
I thought...maybe I could get through to@her somehow.
Like a guardian spirit or something.
But it doesn't really work that way.
No matter how hard I scream... *Sob*@I can't...I can't make her hear me!

group_1.textLeft: Mel...

group_1.textRight: *Sob*

group_1.textLeft: I regret not watching over Yachiyo...

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I thought my voice would never reach her,@so I just gave up from the start.
But I had no idea she felt this responsible@for our deaths...
There's no way she was!

group_1.textRight: Kanae...

group_1.textLeft: I chose my own path...
And I decided to use my life to protect@Yachiyo.
So...I just can't let her think that way.
She should never think she sacrificed me!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah! Yeah, that's how I feel, too!
I'm a fortune-teller...
I followed my fate through to the very end!

group_1.textLeft: Even if she couldn't hear a word I said...
I should have stayed by her side, shouting@the truth!
I've been a ghost longer than you, so@maybe I got too used to it.
If I keep going like this, my heart will@shrivel up and die like the rest of me...
Mel, we have to do this.

group_1.textRight: Do what?

group_1.textLeft: Whatever it takes...
Our voices have to reach her!
